long_description: Well you’re ‘here’ which is really nowhere. Literally, you are surrounded by the <EMPTINESS> of Space. Floating here between the Space Near EVA Chamber and Space Near Escape Pod. Oh that Pod you saw sticking out from the station? Yup, definitely the Escape Pod. From this closer distance you can see it strategically placed at the end of the station, ready to jettison its occupant away into the great yonder! In the distance you can see several <LIGHTS> blinking in a rhythmic fasion.
short_description: You are back in Space, the emptiness between the Space Near EVA Chamber and the Space Near Escape Pod. You don’t want to float here forever.

feature1_keywords.emptiness: Floating here without the loud bustle of the station all around you is a vast and infinitely relaxing nothing. No expectations, no responsibilities, just time to ponder. You decide to float for a little while longer before getting back to work.
feature1_keywords.lights: Watching the lights flash you find yourself feeling content and relaxed. Maybe finding a life for yourself out here wouldn't be so bad.
